b'Aoki Hagane no Arpeggio: Ars Nova - Ki: b'The rebroadcasting of the 12-episode TV anime Arpeggio of Blue Steel: Ars Nova has started on Tokyo MX and Sun TV since yesterday on April 5. Its each episode comes with a newly-produced 60-second parody short series "Kirikumas" featuring the world all of the mental model girls become stuffed teddy bears.\n\n(Source: Crunchyroll)'
